revised_title: Properties and Design Considerations of Wildhaber-Novikov Circular Arc Gears
tldr: This paper explores the properties and design considerations of Wildhaber-Novikov circular arc gears, focusing on their sensitivity to changes in centers distance, the compromise between sensitivity and contact stress, and the extent of the contact area. The authors provide a rigorous analysis of the gears' geometry and kinematics, considering variations on the basic design and operation under different conditions than those for which the gears were originally designed.
